entry.title: Inspiring Change in Tanzania
entry.content:
Inspiring Change in Tanzania

We partnered with local leaders in Tanzania to improve access to clean energy, impacting over 1,000 households with solar solutions.

Kiswahili: Tulishirikiana na viongozi wa ndani nchini Tanzania ili kuboresha upatikanaji wa nishati safi, na kuathiri zaidi ya kaya 1,000 kwa suluhisho za jua.

Published: 07:44 PM EAT, May 30, 2025 • Yeeba Impact

Author: Yeeba Impact

entry.title: Education for All in Uganda
entry.content:
Education for All in Uganda

Our initiative in Uganda brought educational resources to remote areas, benefiting over 2,000 children in 2024 alone.

Kiswahili: Mpango wetu nchini Uganda ulileta rasilimali za elimu katika maeneo ya mbali, na kufaidi zaidi ya watoto 2,000 mwaka wa 2024 pekee.

Published: 07:44 PM EAT, May 30, 2025 • Yeeba Impact

Author: Yeeba Impact

entry.title: Impact Prognosis
entry.content:
Impact Prognosis

Once the diagnosis is clear, it's time to chart a path forward. Crafting interventions isn't about imposing solutions; it's about designing programs that resonate deeply with the communities you serve...

Kiswahili: Mara tu utambuzi unapokuwa wazi, ni wakati wa kuweka njia ya mbele. Kuunda hatua za kuingilia si kuhusu kulazimisha suluhisho; ni kuhusu kubuni programu zinazohusiana kwa undani na jamii unazohudumia...

Published: April 23, 2024

Author: Yeeba Impact

entry.title: Impact Diagnosis
entry.content:
Impact Diagnosis

Imagine trying to solve a puzzle without seeing the full picture. That's what addressing community needs without a proper diagnosis feels like. At Yeeba Impact, we start with a comprehensive needs assessment...

Kiswahili: Fikiria kujaribu kutatua fumbo bila kuona picha kamili. Hivyo ndivyo inavyohisi kushughulikia mahitaji ya jamii bila utambuzi sahihi. Katika Yeeba Impact, tunaanza na tathmini ya kina ya mahitaji...

Published: April 23, 2024

Author: Yeeba Impact

entry.title: Impact Monitoring
entry.content:
Impact Monitoring

Good intentions are only as strong as their execution. As your initiatives roll out, we ensure they remain on track through rigorous monitoring...

Kiswahili: Nia njema ni za nguvu kama utekelezaji wao. Wakati mipango yako inapoanza, tunahakikisha inabaki kwenye mstari kupitia ufuatiliaji wa makini...

Published: April 23, 2024

Author: Yeeba Impact

entry.title: Impact Evaluation
entry.content:
Impact Evaluation

When the work is done, how do you measure its success? At Yeeba Impact, we go beyond surface-level metrics to uncover the true depth of your impact...

Kiswahili: Kazi ikimalizika, unapimaje mafanikio yake? Katika Yeeba Impact, tunaenda zaidi ya vipimo vya juu juu ili kufichua kina cha athari yako...

Published: April 23, 2024

Author: Yeeba Impact

entry.title: Clean Water for All in Kenya
entry.content:
Clean Water for All in Kenya

In Kenya, we worked with local communities to install water purification systems, providing clean water to over 5,000 people in 2024.

Kiswahili: Nchini Kenya, tulifanya kazi na jamii za mitaa kuweka mifumo ya kusafisha maji, ikitoa maji safi kwa watu zaidi ya 5,000 mwaka wa 2024.

Published: 07:44 PM EAT, May 30, 2025 • Yeeba Impact

Author: Yeeba Impact

entry.title: Monitoring Agricultural Growth in Rwanda
entry.content:
Monitoring Agricultural Growth in Rwanda

We monitored crop yields in rural Rwanda, providing farmers with real-time data to optimize planting seasons and increase productivity by 20%.

Kiswahili: Tulifuata ukuaji wa mazao katika vijijini Rwanda, tukiwapa wakulima data ya wakati halisi ili kuboresha misimu ya upandaji na kuongeza tija kwa 20%.

Published: 07:44 PM EAT, May 30, 2025 • Yeeba Impact

Author: Yeeba Impact
